articles.title: Would have been nice to play another WC with Viru, Yuvi and Gambhir: Harbhajan Singh - ANI News
articles.description: Jalandhar (Punjab) [India], January 9 (ANI): Harbhajan Singh had a very successful career as a cricketer playing 103 Tests, 236 ODIs and 28 T20Is for the country picking up 417 wickets in Tests and 294 wickets overall in limited-overs cricket.
